name: ClickTDudes
description:
Art by @UserKindaMakesStuff

some smol dudes are in your house and you need to catch a specific one because THIS DOESN'T MAKE SENSE

CONTROLS:

Left Click or tap - click the dude

UPCOMING UPDATES:

Countdown
